definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: The former president was hospitalized with heart problems on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 这位埃及前总统星期二因心脏问题入院治疗。

sentences.english: After in hospital, inspects discovered that what the baby contracts is the pneumococcal bronchopneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 入院后检查发现宝宝患的是肺炎球菌性支气管肺炎。

sentences.english: A 42-year-old woman was admitted with hypotension.
sentences.chinese: 一位42岁的女性因低血压入院。

sentences.english: Once I'd been admitted to hospital, I started the standard three-drug regime.
sentences.chinese: 我一被准许入院，就开始了标准的三种药物混合疗法。

sentences.english: As sick patients were hospitalized, the treatment given, usually a nebulizer that could open up clogged lung passages, actually disseminated the virus further.
sentences.chinese: 在病人入院后，通常会给以雾化治疗来疏通肺部阻塞。

sentences.english: Frequent readmission was also found to be associated with LM.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现频繁的再入院同样与LM相关。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of pre-admission psychological counselling on nurse-patient relationship.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨入院前心理咨询对护患关系改善的影响。

sentences.english: 2 weeks after admission to hospital, the patient's left leg pain had completely resolved, and the swelling went down gradually.
sentences.chinese: 入院后2周病人左腿疼痛完全缓解，肿胀逐渐消退。

sentences.english: All of these patients were hospitalized because of severe haematological disorders.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些患者均因严重的血液病而入院治疗。

sentences.english: The primary outcome was hospital readmission and mortality and readmission diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 主要结果评估是再次入院，死亡率以及再次入院诊断。

sentences.english: The primary outcome was hospital readmission and mortality and readmission diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 主要结果评估是再次入院，死亡率以及再次入院诊断。

sentences.english: All the stimulated stroke coma, critically hospital.
sentences.chinese: 全受刺激中风昏迷入院，情况危殆。

sentences.english: Since his admission, morphine was used for relieving precordial pain.
sentences.chinese: 自从患者入院后为了缓解胸部疼痛给予吗啡治疗。

sentences.english: Mr. Toyoda confirms he entered the hospital but declines to comment on the reason.
sentences.chinese: 丰田章男证实自己曾经入院，但拒绝评论个中原由。

sentences.english: All four are currently in a stable condition in hospital.
sentences.chinese: 入院治疗的四个病人现在都病情稳定。

sentences.english: None of the gastric band patients in the study had complications that required readmission to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 在研究中，没有胃带病人患有需要重新入院的并发症。

definition: to be in hospital/to be hospitalized
to leave hospital/to be discharged from hospital
to receive hospital treatment/to be hospitalized
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)
to transfer (a patient) to a different hospital/to transfer to hospital (e.g. a prisoner)
child victim of disaster or disease/afflicted child
